alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 7:11PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Aransas, Coastal San Patricio, Aransas Islands, Coastal Calhoun, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
